sentence.Network_en: As an investment, bricks and mortar are not what they were.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一种投资，房产不再是从前意义上的房产。

sentence.Network_en: Cars and trucks have been torched, bottles and bricks thrown.
sentence.Network_cn: 轿车、卡车被放火焚烧，瓶子与砖块乱砸乱飞。

sentence.Network_en: The aisle was floored with ancient bricks.
sentence.Network_cn: 过道由古旧的砖块铺就。

entry.def: Bricks are rectangular blocks of baked clay used for building walls, which are usually red or brown. Brick is the material made up of these blocks.

example.ex: She built bookshelves out of bricks and planks.
example.tran: 她用砖和木板制作书架。

example.ex: ...a tiny garden surrounded by high brick walls.
example.tran: 四周有高高的砖墙环绕的小花园

entry.def: If you say that someone is a brick, you mean that they have helped you or supported you when you were in a difficult situation.

example.ex: You were a brick, a real friend in need.
example.tran: 你很够朋友，是真正的患难之交。

entry.def: If you are banging your head against a brick wall, what you are saying or doing is not having any effect although you keep saying or doing it.

example.ex: I wanted to sort out this problem with him, but it was like banging my head against a brick wall.
example.tran: 我曾想跟他把这个问题给解决了，但结果徒劳无功。

entry.def: If you hit a brick wall or come up against a brick wall, you are unable to continue or make progress because something stops you.

example.ex: After that my career just seemed to hit a brick wall...
example.tran: 在那之后我的事业似乎就陷入了困境。

example.ex: The discussions in Brussels hit a brick wall.
example.tran: 在布鲁塞尔进行的商谈进展受阻。

entry.def: You can use bricks and mortar to refer to houses and other buildings, especially when they are considered as an investment.

example.ex: Paying rent simply helps to line the pockets of landlords. It's far better to put your money into bricks and mortar of your own...
example.tran: 租房子只会鼓了房东的腰包，自己投资买房要合算得多。

example.ex: As an investment, bricks and mortar are not what they were.
example.tran: 作为一种投资，房产不再是从前意义上的房产。

example.en: I have a long way to go, I'd better hit the bricks.
example.zh: 我要走很长一段路呢，我还是走吧。

example.en: Go on! Hit the pavemem! Get going!
He'll hit the bricks tomorrow，having been paroled.
example.zh: 他已经获得假释，明天就出狱。

example.en: Agree to our demands, or we hh the bricks.
example.zh: 答应我们的要求，否则我们就罢工。
